we put out the security alert weeks ago. we've stopped maintaining the 0.0.9.x tree though, since it's 9 months old now.
we put out a patch for the 0.1.0.x tree, and the 0.1.1.x tree, and told people that 0.0.9.x was now obsolete. so ubuntu is sort of in a bind.
